data.name: Night Elf
data.description:
Night Elf

Units:
+1.5 HP/sec regeneration

Buildings:
+25% HP/sec regeneration

Upgrades:
+3Lv Building Damage
-10% research speed

Traits: Dedicated and specialized units, trained to fulfil their role to the max. Balanced and strong race without apparent weaknesses. Its full potential is impresive but it rises slowly and can be hard to reach.

Difficulty: Skilled

auras.name: Camouflage Aura
auras.description:
Hides your buildings
(1500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Arcane Aura
auras.description:
+4 HP/s unit regeneration
(affects organic units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Thorns Aura
auras.description:
45 damage return shield
+4 base armor
(affects your buildings only)
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Ancient Guardian [Q]
bonuses.description:
Cenarius replaces Tiny

Special Unit (Ranged)
-20% buy cooldown
Gets special items at Lv4/8/14/20
Role: Pusher
Can learn:
Mass Entangle (Disable Spell)
14-26 sec stun in a radius
(350-650 area of effect)
Force of Nature (Summoning Spell)
summons 3-6 Treants
Inspiration Aura (Support Aura)
12-30% damage bonus
Ancient Sprout (Summoning Spell)
summons 2 Ancients

Type: Late Game Push

bonuses.name: Dryad [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Force of Nature

Dryad replaces Druid of Talon
Spellcaster
+4 damage
+50 MP
Abilities:
Faerie Dust (Support Spell)
(+5/10/15/20% damage)
(affects non-Hero units only)
Spell Resistance (Passive Skill)
(15/20/25/30% spell damage reduction)
(immunity to some spells)
Upgrades used:
Druidism (Upgrades Abilities)
Moon Armor
Critical Hit
Force of Nature

Type: Unit Buffs

units.name: Dryad
units.description:
Spellcaster
Strong Vs Melee Unit
Weak Vs Ranged Unit

bonuses.name: Shadowmeld [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Powerful Blow
+1 level of Animal Form

Reduces spell damage to Druid of Claw, Archer, Druid of Talon and Huntress by 15%. Your units become invisible. Unit Evasion is increased by 5%.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

bonuses.name: Ancient of Storms [F]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Solid Boulders

Ancient of Storms replaces Forest Guardian
Siege Unit (Melee)
+60% attack rate
+600 HP
+4 armor
Abilities:
Tornado (Damage Spell)
(150 damage in a line)
Cyclone (Disable Spell)
(disables 1 unit for 8 sec)
Upgrades used:
Natures's Wrath
Moon Armor
Solid Boulders

Type: Late Game Push

units.name: Ancient of Storms
units.description:
Artillery Unit
Strong Vs Buildings

bonuses.name: Rise of the Ancients [Z]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Vengeance

When Ancient of War hit points drop bellow 10% it will uproot and wreak havoc on the battlefield.
(can capture neutral buildings)
(can be uprooted manually)
(UW can bypass this skill)

Type: Base Defence / Suicide Run

spells.name: Rise of the Ancients
spells.description:

(can capture neutral buildings)

spells.name: Uproot Ancient [Z]
spells.description: Clockwise Ancient of War.

spells.name: Uproot Ancient [X]
spells.description: Middle Ancient of War.

spells.name: Uproot Ancient [C]
spells.description: Counter clockwise Ancient of War.

bonuses.name: Ancient Artifacts [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Ancient Artifacts
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Pawn Item [Z]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

spells.name: Pawn Item [X]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Agility Hero.

spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Intelligence Hero.

bonuses.description:

Has Global Silence and Mana Leak Aura.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon

spells.name: Anti-Magic Shield
spells.description:
Reduces spell damage to buildings by 90%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon

spells.name: Global Silence (Lv1) [S]
spells.description:
Silences enemy units and structures for 10 sec.
(does not affect Special unit)
Cooldown: 180 seconds.

spells.name: Mana Leak Aura
spells.description:
-1.5 MP/s to enemy units.
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold bounty for killing Heroes.
(let the dumb nabs feed you...)

Type: Anti Hero

upgrades.name: Fuck Heroes (Lv1)
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+15% damage reduction
+3 armor reduction
+1000 Aura range

spells.name: Cripple (Lv1) [W]
spells.description:
Reduces damage by 25% for 60 sec.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

towerUpgrades.name: Savage Attack
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and stun
Affects: Druid of Claw
(affects Bear, Wildkin and Treant)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: +6 damage, 10% for 1.5 sec stun
Lv2: +12 damage, 20% for 1.5 sec stun
Lv3: +18 damage, 30% for 1.5 sec stun
Lv4: +24 damage, 40% for 1.5 sec stun

towerUpgrades.name: Animal Form
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: shapeshift ability
Affects: Druid of Claw and Druid of Talon
(animal form has bonus stats)

Lv1: +25 HP, +2 armor and +3 HP/sec
Lv2: +50 HP, +4 armor and +6 HP/sec
Lv3: +75 HP, +6 armor and +9 HP/sec
Lv4: +100 HP, +8 armor and +12 HP/sec

towerUpgrades.name: Critical Hit
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance for bonus damage
Affects: Archer and Hippogryph Rider

Lv1: 10% to do 2.25x damage
Lv2: 20% to do 2.5x damage
Lv3: 30% to do 2.75x damage
Lv4: 40% to do 3x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Slow Poison
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage over time
Affects: Archer and Hippogryph Rider
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 6 damage/sec for 10 sec
Lv2: 12 damage/sec for 12 sec
Lv3: 18 damage/sec for 14 sec
Lv4: 24 damage/sec for 16 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Moon Glaive
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage, range and bouncing
Affects: Huntress
(35% damage loss per bounce)
(does not affect buildings)

Lv1: +6 damage, +25 range, 1 bounce
Lv2: +12 damage, +50 range, 2 bounces
Lv3: +18 damage, +75 range, 3 bounces
Lv4: +24 damage, +100 range, 4 bounces

towerUpgrades.name: Animal Synergy
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack rate and evasion
Affects: Huntress and Hippogryph Rider

Lv1: +5% attack rate, +5% evasion
Lv2: +10% attack rate, +10% evasion
Lv3: +15% attack rate, +15% evasion
Lv4: +20% attack rate, +20% evasion

towerUpgrades.name: Solid Boulders
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to stun
Affects: Forest Guardian and Ancient Protector
(has half duration on Heroes)

Lv1: 15% chance for 2 sec stun
Lv2: 30% chance for 2 sec stun
Lv3: 45% chance for 2 sec stun
Lv4: 60% chance for 2 sec stun

towerUpgrades.name: Force of Nature
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: summoning ability
Affects: Druid of Talon

Lv1: summons Lesser Treant for 15 sec
Lv2: summons Treant for 20 sec
Lv3: summons Greater Treant for 25 sec
Lv4: summons Ancient Treant for 30 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Vengeance
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to spawn a Wisp
Affects: Your dying units

Lv1: 10% chance, has Healing Wave
heals 25/50/75/100 HP to 3 units
Lv2: 12% chance, has Mana Burn
burns 20/40/60 mana
Lv3: 14% chance, has Silence
silences for 20/40 sec
Lv4: 16% chance, has Faerie Dust
+25% damage to 1 unit

t1spell.name: Entangle [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 200 damage in 170 AoE.
Stuns for 16 sec.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Starfall [X]
t2spell.description:
Calls down faling stars over your base.
Deals 300 damage every 3 sec for 18 sec.
(has 3 sec delay after activation)
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

(has 3 sec delay after activation)
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.description:

Can train Heroes

skills.name: Repair (Lv1) [Q]
skills.description:

heroes.name: Train Warden
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Fan of Knives (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a radius
(350-500 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)

Shadow Orb (Orb Effect)
18-30% lifesteal, 20 mana burn
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Warden's Grip (Disable mini Aura)
14-20% AS, 28-40% MS reduction
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Spirit of Vengeance (Self Spell)
1000-2000 HP, 10% AS, 8 armor
(summons more spirits on kill)

heroes.name: Priestess
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Support

Can learn:
Rejuvenation (Healing Spell)
600-1200 HP to 1 unit over 5 sec

Burning Arrows (Orb Effect)
8-20 damage/sec to buildings

True Aim Aura (Support Aura)
13-25% ranged damage bonus

Starfall (Damage Spell)
30-60 damage/sec for 10 sec
(600-900 area of effect)

skills.name: Starfall - [Level 1]
skills.description: Calls down lightning storm, which deals 300 damage to units in an area.

heroes.description:

heroes.description:

Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Stone Skin (Passive Skill)
20-34% to block an attack

skills.name: Seismic Wave - [Level 1]
skills.description: Sends a wave of force out in a straight line, dealing 250 damage and stunning enemy units for 3 seconds.
